name: Esoteric Alteration
flavorText: Chuanyang of Xiansai designed a gem which would transport magical energies from their target to the workshop of his greatest competitor, Chau Thanh. He created several copies of this gem before he mysteriously disappeared.
flavorTextHtml: Chuanyang of Xiansai designed a gem which would transport magical energies from their target to the workshop of his greatest competitor, Chau Thanh. He created several copies of this gem before he mysteriously disappeared.

secondary.textHtml: Gain 10.0% non-Physical damage reduction. 10.0%
